conversations.conversation:
A donkey and a chicken are out in a field when the donkey falls down a hole....the chicken races over and jumps into the farmers bmw, ties a rope to the front and pulls him out.
;The next week they're out in the field and the chicken falls down a hole! He tells the donkey to run and get the bmw but instead the donkey walks over to the hole and drops his cock in, and the chicken climbs out.
;
;Moral of the story: when ur hung like a donkey u dont need a bmw to pull a chick!!

Larry was visited by God......
;

;

;Larry said he did his best but last week he saw his wife bent over the freezer and took her there and then!
;God said 'ah Jesus Larry they wont be happy in heaven'.
;Larry said 'they weren't to happy in tesco either'

The nerves r really startin to kick in now......and i'm startin to think i really am mad!

;Chelle ;
